verbs.description: [ARG1: The curious relationship between one of the world ’s biggest drug makers and President Trump ’s personal lawyer] [V: began] [ARGM-TMP: early last year] [ARGM-TMP: when Michael Cohen , a long - time fixer for the president , reached out to Novartis 's then - chief executive officer Joe Jimenez promising access to the new administration] .

The curious relationship between one of the world ’s biggest drug makers and President Trump ’s personal lawyer began [ARGM-TMP: early last year] [R-ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: Michael Cohen , a long - time fixer for the president ,] [V: reached] [ARGM-DIR: out] [ARG2: to Novartis 's then - chief executive officer Joe Jimenez] [ARG1: promising access to the new administration] .

The curious relationship between one of the world ’s biggest drug makers and President Trump ’s personal lawyer began early last year when [ARG0: Michael Cohen ,] a long - time fixer for the president , reached out to [ARG0: Novartis 's then - chief executive officer Joe Jimenez] [V: promising] [ARG1: access to the new administration] .
